title: Hoops Tonight - Steph Curry’s return to MVP form, Warriors dominate Heat, Toronto Raptors hot star
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Steph Curry’s return to MVP form, Warriors dominate Heat, Toronto Raptors hot star
description:
First (3:00), Jason Timpf reacts to Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors' 123-110 win over Jimmy Butler and the Miami Heat. Jason discusses Steph Curry's MVP start to the season, Klay Thompson returning to form, and the Miami Heat's early struggles. Later (19:00), he takes a deep dive into the Toronto Raptors and their outlook for the 2022-2023 NBA season. #Volume #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
